mapper.select: select employee_id,name as value from employee where is_deleted = 0 and airport_code = #{airportCode}
mapper.update: update sys_user_role set is_deleted = 1 where menu_id not in (${roleIds}) and airport_code = #{airportCode} and user_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.select: select role_id as roleId from sys_user_role where user_id = #{employeeId} and airport_code = #{airportCode} and is_deleted = 0
